game.name: Iona's Island
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Restore a vibrant island paradise atop a giant sea turtle! As the Leshen Iona, wield ancient spells to heal the land and befriend islanders and help them with their quests. Create your own enchanting sandbox style sanctuary. Uncover secrets and reshape a world with accompanied by cozy, lofi vibes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Restore a vibrant island paradise atop a giant sea turtle! As the Leshen Iona, wield ancient spells to heal the land and befriend islanders and help them with their quests. Create your own enchanting sandbox style sanctuary. Uncover secrets and reshape a world with accompanied by cozy, lofi vibes.
